Posts.Content: Thanks Chrissi, ive tried to put this to the back of my mond but as my wedding approaches i am getting more and more obsessed with having children. Pregnant women seem to be everywhere i look. I have tried talking to my oncologist on numerous occasions but i think there is very little research on breast cancer in women of our age so they find it difficult to advise. I am so sorry to here about your secondary cancer - i hope things are going as well as they can for you - thnaks for replying, Emma xxx
Posts.Title: Please help? Does getting pregnant after estrogen receptive breast...

Posts.Content: I am recovering from breast cancer which was diagnosed in Aug 07. The cancer was estrogen receptive and i have been through chemo and am now on zoladex until feb 10 and tamoxifen for up to another three yrs. I am getting married next year and am going out og my mind with worry about what to do for the best. I am desperate to have kids but am worried about the risks. Please help, Emma 32
